creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in Memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: side chair, one of a pair, Sheraton type, central splat contains palmette springing from a vase-shaped base, decorated with pendant husks; known as a \'rachel back,\' front of seat serpentine shape; front legs show \'spade foot,\' also known as a \'Marlborough leg\' a characteristic (in England) only found in the late Georgian period, i.e., 1760-1800; material is mahogany according to curatorial files
title: Racket-back Sheraton side chair, one of a pair
